meta.job_title: Associate Director/Director of Global Project Management

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide program management leadership through active input into the project strategy & vision, ensuring alignment of the project strategy with operational delivery
Coach project teams towards successful issue resolution and decision making, focusing the team on the right activities at the right time
Manage both internal and external stakeholders, proactively communicating with senior team leaders, functions, and partners
Manages multiple cross-functional teams towards optimized governance decisions, investment decisions, project revisions, etc.

Ensure that overall team results, budgets, schedules, and performance standards are realistically set, governance approved and attained, and that the project optimally fulfills all business reporting requirements both internally and within alliance
Champion company best practices and adoption of new project management practices, driving cross-project learning, champion and embed better ways of working across the enterprise and alliance

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a scientific subject, Master’s degree or higher preferred
